item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Security_Answer
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer_Security_Answer Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Customer_Security_Answer type contains user’s answers to security questions. Local answer A user's answer. Type: string id A user's answer identifying number. Type: integer questionId A user's question identifying number. Type: integer userId A user's identifying number. Type: integer Relational question The question the security answer is associated with.
